metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2990 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: An incorrect handling of the supplementary groups in the Buildah container engine might lead to the sensitive information disclosure or possible data modification if an attacker has direct access to the affected container where supplementary groups are used to set access permissions and is able to execute a binary code in that container.

criterions.comment: golang-github-containers-buildah package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
